mapper.select: select * from member_memberagreement where biddingOID=#{biddingOID} and contractType =#{contractType} ORDER BY OID DESC LIMIT 1
select * from from MEMBER_MemberAgreement where and loanNumber = #{loanNumber} and contractType =#{contractType} ORDER BY OID DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_memberagreement ( OID, memberOID, name, nameCN, content, biddingType, contractType, valid, addDateTime, updDateTime, refresh, version, biddingOID, xybh, state, loanNumber, ckOID, signIDs, pdfPath, pdfPic ) VALUES ( #{OID}, #{memberOID}, #{name}, #{nameCN}, #{content}, #{biddingType}, #{contractType}, 1, NOW(), NOW(), 1, 0, #{biddingOID}, #{xybh}, '0', #{loanNumber}, #{ckOID}, #{signIDs}, #{pdfPath}, #{pdfPic} );
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from MEMBER_MemberAgreement WHERE biddingType=#{biddingType} and contractType=#{contractType} and addDateTime < = NOW()
SELECT * from MEMBER_MemberAgreement WHERE biddingType=#{biddingType} and contractType='7' and memberOID=#{memberOID}

SELECT bdff.memberOID jkrOID, bdff.realName jkrxm, bdff.mobile jkrsjh, bdff.idCard jkrsfzh, pbc.OID biddingOID, pbc.loanDay loanDay FROM WEBP2P_BiddingExamine bdff JOIN WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning pbc ON bdff.loanNumber =pbc.loanNumber WHERE pbc.financetransfertype = 'normal' AND bdff.loanNumber =#{loanNumber} UNION ALL SELECT bdff.memberOID jkrOID, bdff.realName jkrxm, bdff.mobile jkrsjh, bdff.idCard jkrsfzh, nbr.OID biddingOID, nbr.loanDay loanDay FROM WEBP2P_BiddingExamine bdff JOIN WEBP2P_NoviceBiddingRuning nbr ON nbr.loanNumber = bdff.loanNumber WHERE nbr.debitCreditOID IS NULL AND bdff.loanNumber =#{loanNumber} UNION ALL SELECT pbcr.memberOID jkrOID, clci.customername jkrxm, clci.phone jkrsjh, clci.certificatesid jkrsfzh, pbcr.OID biddingOID, pbcr.loanDay loanDay FROM WEBP2P_CarLoanCenterInfo clci JOIN WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning pbcr ON pbcr.loanNumber =clci.loanNumber WHERE pbcr.financetransfertype = 'normal' AND clci.loanNumber = #{loanNumber}
select xybh from MEMBER_MemberAgreement where biddingOID =#{biddingOID} and contractType =#{contractType}
select pdfPath from member_memberagreement where OID=#{OID}
